column4: suddenly, files dont open with the default program any more...also in nautilus, movie/music/launcher icons show up as text icons...how can i fix this?
right click on the file,  go to properties,  open with  and specify the right app again,  not sure about the icon
oh, you are talking about launchers ?  , just point them to the right prog then
launchers are just like  making a shortcut to a .exe file in windows,  just point it to the prog
